column5: Fished lots of small lakes, almost all produced a hawg at some point. Still looking for a couple more pics.. but here's the jist of it:             Skinny's hawg^^    Enjoy!
Awesome! Love largemouth bass especially when the heavy cover is around!
Sweet Rich.  Bass,n out of a dingy.
I'd take it anyday of the week over bassin off the bank.. or in a canoe for that matter. It's stable, quick, goes anywhere.. and zero emissions!
They sure are some nice Bass Rich!!!Gotta love it!
Show off. Have you named them all? I bet you've caught one more than once there!  Good going kiddo. You make us all proud out our way.
Great looking fish. I think it's time for you to start getting a web show together.   Seriously.
No matter what boat I'm in chances are there is emissions. Those are some nice hoggs. That one pic of your buddy looks like Indian Pond.
Nice fish! You sure like that slop doncha boy!

Thanks everyone!  HD, actually only one of them was caught in any real slop, guess which one  hint it's my friend Brandon holding it .  MoS - not Indian, right next door..  And the lost pics:   Eric's shore beast on a buzzbait. Honestly, was a big big fish.. poor photo justice.   Too much photo justice.   A senko pike that surprised the heck out of us, smashing it in inches of water at Eric's feet.   Perfect photo justice.
Some fine looking Buckets right there....
Nice hawgs there! I've actually found that pike really like senkos if you get it close enough to them.
LOL. Gotta love sloppy bassin.  cheers.
